sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, Col, Container, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const SingleProduct = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Back

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}

 Description :{product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: 0 ? 'green' : 'red', }}> {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default SingleProduct
